# Mradul Sharma - Full Stack Developer Portfolio

## About
Senior Full-Stack Developer specializing in Laravel, React, Node.js, and AWS.
Building enterprise-grade applications with focus on scalability and performance.
Location: Etah, Uttar Pradesh, India

## Services
- Full Stack Development (Laravel, React, Node.js, Next.js)
- AWS Cloud Architecture & Consulting
- Custom API Development & Integration
- Database Optimization (PostgreSQL, MongoDB)
- DevOps & CI/CD Pipeline Setup
- Microservices Architecture
- Payment Gateway Integration
- Performance Optimization

## Portfolio
Enterprise applications and SaaS platforms:
- PayStubx: Enterprise Payroll Management System built with Laravel and PostgreSQL
- Storytellers: Scalable Content Management Platform with AWS integration
- Wealth Mark: Real-time Crypto Trading Platform using WebSockets
- Multiple e-commerce and business applications

## Technical Expertise
- Backend: Laravel, Node.js, PHP, Express.js
- Frontend: React, Next.js, Vue.js, JavaScript ES6+
- Cloud: AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda), Docker, Kubernetes
- Databases: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis
- DevOps: CI/CD, Git, Jenkins, GitHub Actions
